title: Watch Fonseca vs. Struff on Challenger TV
description: Joao Fonseca's matches have rapidly become must-watch TV for tennis fans around the globe. The next opportunity to watch the fast-rising Brazilian will be Thursday at the Arizona Tennis Classic, where he faces fourth seed Jan-Lennard Struff in the second round. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost. Watch Joao Fonseca vs. Jan-Lennard Struff (not before 7 p.m. local time)
excerpt: Joao Fonseca faces fourth seed Jan-Lennard Struff on Thursday at the Arizona Tennis Classic, an ATP Challenger 175 event in Phoenix.

Watch Fonseca vs. Struff on Challenger TV

#NextGenATP teen plays Thursday evening in Phoenix

March 13, 2025

Mary Grace Grabill/Arizona Tennis Classic

Joao Fonseca is in action this week at the Arizona Tennis Classic. By ATP Staff

Joao Fonseca's matches have rapidly become must-watch TV for tennis fans around the globe.

The next opportunity to watch the fast-rising Brazilian will be Thursday at the Arizona Tennis Classic, where he faces fourth seed Jan-Lennard Struff in the second round.

Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.

Watch Joao Fonseca vs. Jan-Lennard Struff (not before 7 p.m. local time)
